title: WTT - 3 P2 HOF for P2 Walter Johnson
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTT - 3 P2 HOF for P2 Walter Johnson
posts.post_content:
Picked these three HOF up, but thinking about putting together the Washington subset.  Condition not terribly important... Prefer something close to these.  All three are factory 42:
"Chief" Bender
Mordecai Brown
John McGraw
